    IOS-XR Vagrant Private Beta

    Fill out the fields below and we’ll get back to you with a link to the IOS-XR Vagrant box.
    Thank you for your participation!

    Already received an approval? You’re all set to get your API-KEY. Click here to understand how to generate your API-KEY and download the vagrant box:
    Generate API-KEY to access IOS-XR Vagrant box

    You will need a CCO ID to download the box! If you don’t have one, please click here to register: Create CCO ID

    Make sure you activate your account once you receive an email, post registration.
